249b7(mdo sde): rten mthun 'jug yin// mi skye ba ni gang mthong ba// ma rig de ni ye shes bgegs// rig pa bskyed par ston mdzad pa// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin// rdzogs
250a1(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas gcig yin yang // sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir// 'byung ba dag ni bsam mi khyab// 'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug
250a2(mdo sde): yin// gang dag mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di// phyi ma'i dus na thos 'gyur zhing // the tsom med la shes 'gyur ba// de dag sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong // 'jig rten mgon gyis de gsungs
250a3(mdo sde): nas sras po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sogs// rab tu dga' zhing yi rangs te// ston pa'i bka' la mngon par bstod/ 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su
250a4(mdo sde): mthun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban b+he ye shes sdes
250a5(mdo sde): bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar rabacad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ni ya ta a ni pa
250a6(mdo sde): ta gau ti mu drA/ a ba ta ra rA ba ma hA yAr sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs
250a7(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rol
250b1(mdo sde): dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu la 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gzhor nur gyur
250b2(mdo sde): pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / sman gyi rgyal po dang / sman gyis yang dag 'phags dang / mchod rten mngon par bsgrags pa'i
250b3(mdo sde): sgra skad rgyal po dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag drug cu thams cad kyang rab tu zhi ba/ rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin la
250b4(mdo sde): gnas pa/ zab cing brtan pa'i chu'i rgya mtsho'i dus rlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ dbang bskur ba'i gzungs thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog mtha' yas pa yongs su
250b5(mdo sde): 'grub pa'i gzungs thob pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol/
250b6(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya gang gis byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam
250b7(mdo sde): las phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi
251a1(mdo sde): ldog pa'o zhes bgyi bar bdag gis 'tshal bar 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges pa dang / mi nges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya
251a2(mdo sde): 'jug pa zhes brdzi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon dur
251a3(mdo sde): gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba ni lnga po 'di dag yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phyugs
251a4(mdo sde): kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu dang / zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu dang / nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu dang / de bzhin
251a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu ste/ 'jam dpal lta po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'gro ba yin no// 'jam dpal de la byang chub sems dpa' gnyis
251a6(mdo sde): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba yin no// byang chub sems dpa' gsum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i 'gro ba
251a7(mdo sde): yin no// 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma nges pa'i 'gro ba pa/ bla na
251b1(mdo sde): med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las slar ldog pa dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rnas 'grobs su
251b2(mdo sde): drang glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin te/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' 'di gnyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mnges te/ zar
251b3(mdo sde): med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir ldog pa yin no// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul
251b4(mdo sde): gyis 'gro ba pa lta bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu 'di gsum ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges te/ tha
251b5(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir mi ldog pa yin no// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' phrugs kyi shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin par rig par
251b6(mdo sde): bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'da' bar 'dod la/
251b7(mdo sde): der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/
252a1(mdo sde): bdag gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya ba ma mo// de'ang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ mal bdag phyugs kyi
252a2(mdo sde): shing rdul zhon la 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'dra' bar bya gor ma chag skam ste/ 'jam dpal mi de phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon te/ lam der zhugs nas/ de yun ring zhing /
252a3(mdo sde): dus ring mo zhig na/ dpag tshad brgyar phyin pa las/ de rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas bzlogs nas dpag tshad brgyad cur phyir nged de phul na/ 'jam dpal/
252a4(mdo sde): 'di ji snyam du sems/ mi nges bsgral pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i
252a5(mdo sde): yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' ba'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
252a6(mdo sde): ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ni skabs ma mchis te/ phyugs kyi shing rta la 'tshal ba'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam/ bskul pa brgya'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/
252a7(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni gnas ma mchis lags so//
252b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
252b2(mdo sde): bskyed la/ theg pa chen po mi 'dzin mi klog par nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la bsnyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed cing
252b3(mdo sde): de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul mthun par gnas
252b4(mdo sde): par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha ton byed/ spyod cing khong du chud par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug pa nas/ khong du chud pa'i bar du byed na/
252b5(mdo sde): de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dren cing phyir bzlog go/
252b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de'ang de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang
252b7(mdo sde): ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed do// 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig mig nad kyis mig zum par gyur nas
253a1(mdo sde): de mig dbye ba dang zums su rung bar bya ba'i phyir/ zla ba gcig gi bar du dpyad byas te zla gcig lon nas mig byed cing 'dzums par byed
253a2(mdo sde): pa las de'i dgra'am mi mdza' bgan zhig gis pi pi ling gi phye ma spar gang gis mig bkang nas de'ang long bar byas pa de bzhin du 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'
253a3(mdo sde): de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de de'ang de nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/
253a4(mdo sde): pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rtul por byed cing nyams par byed de/ 'jam dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyugs kyi shing rdzas 'gro ba lta bu yin par rig par bya'o//
253a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin par rig par bya zher/ 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid
253a6(mdo sde): 'da' bar 'dod la de la der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / dor dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas/ de 'di snyam du
253a7(mdo sde): ma la bdag glang po che'i shing rta yan lag/
253a8(mdo sde): sems te/ bdag gis bzhon pa ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de'ang 'di snyad du dpyod do//
253b1(mdo sde): brgyad dang ldan pa la zhor te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag snyam nas 'jam dpal mi de glang po che'i shing rta yar lag brgyang dang ldan pa la nor te
253b2(mdo sde): lam der zhugs ras de lo brgyas dpag tshad nyid stong du son pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos de nas phyir phul te bzlog ra 'jab dpal 'di ji snyam du sems
253b3(mdo sde): glang po che'i shing rda la zhon pa'i mi des bskal pa gcig gam bskal pa brgya 'am bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum mam bskal ba brjod du med
253b4(mdo sde): pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar rus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni gnas ma mchis lags so//
253b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de ri skabs ma mchis te/ glang po che'i shing rta 'tshal ba'i mi nges bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa brgya 'am/ bskal pa stong ngam/ bskal pa
253b6(mdo sde): bye ba phrag 'bum mam/ bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus pa de ni garas ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan
253b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
254a1(mdo sde): bskyed la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la bsnyen cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed cing
254a2(mdo sde): ngag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed la/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam 'chag sar spyod yul mthun
254a3(mdo sde): par gnas par byed/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha stor byed/ spyor cing khong du chud par byed la gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug par byed cing / kha ton
254a4(mdo sde): byed du 'jug la yongs su sbyong bar byed du 'jug na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/ bla na
254a5(mdo sde): mang ba'i ye shes kyi lam las phyir 'dzin cing phyir bu zlog go// byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed
254a6(mdo sde): pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po shes rab kyi mig gang yi pa de'ang de'i na thos kyi theg pa 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa des rgyal por byed ci
254a7(mdo sde): nyams par byed do// 'jam dpal dper na shing gi sdong po chen po srid du dpag cang stong ni g.yod la/ de'ang rgya mtsho chen po khyer ba las bar snang la gnas pa'i gdong
254b1(mdo sde): sbyin dag gis de rgya mtsho chen po'i lam las phyir phul zlog nas de la lcags kyi gar bu dpag tshad lnga stong yod pa zhig btags na 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems
254b2(mdo sde): shing gi sdong po chen po de rgya mtsho chen po la 'gro ba 'am sems can bsgral ba'i phyir spyad par nus sam 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
254b3(mdo sde): de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'i byang chub kyi sems bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab
254b4(mdo sde): kyi shing chen po'ang nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dzin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa nges thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho las phyir phul zhing bzlogs
254b5(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtshor yang 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las kyang sems can rnams sgrol mi nus te/ 'jam dpal
254b6(mdo sde): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma dang zla bas 'gro ba lta bu la yin par
254b7(mdo sde): rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang
255a1(mdo sde): don dang / don chen po dang ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis
255a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de'ang 'di snyam du dpyod do// ma la bdag gis nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya gor ma chag
255a3(mdo sde): snyam nas/ 'jam dpal mi de nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro bas lam der zhugs na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems mi de nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'gro ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams
255a4(mdo sde): de dag 'da' bar nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rngo thogs lags so// bde bar gshegs pa yun ring po dus ring mo zhig gis rngo thogs
255a5(mdo sde): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang /
255a6(mdo sde): chub se mas bsgred la nya thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lta byig tu migs na thos kyi zag pa pa dag la mi bsten cing mi semal bamed pas mi byed na
255a7(mdo sde): kyi theg pa pa dang ga nga thar kyib tu 'dres par mi byed ku tu rgyo kyang yangs spyod par mi byang ku dgapar ba'ang/ gtsug lag khang ngam 'tshig par tshung dul
255b1(mdo sde): mthun par mi byed la nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha ton mi byed/ sems par mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang than tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog
255b2(mdo sde): tu 'jug par mi byed/ kha ton byed du 'jug par mi byed de/ de gang klog pa'ang theg pa chen po kho na klog la/ gang ston pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na ston na/ 'jam
255b3(mdo sde): dpal 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu ma yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal dper na nam mkha' lding gi dbang po chen po'i rgyal po chen po lang tsho dang
255b4(mdo sde): stobs dang / mthu chen po thob pa yin 'dod na/ ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub
255b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang / lang tsho dang / mthu chen po thob pa'ang 'dod na/ sangs
255b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su ston par byed do// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems
255b7(mdo sde): dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na mi la la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod la/ der
256a1(mdo sde): yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched che rab cig yod nas de 'di snyam du
256a2(mdo sde): sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de 'di snyam du dpyod do// ma la bdag nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis
256a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar bya'o snyam mo// 'jam dpal ji snyam du sems mi nges nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar nus sam
256a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rngo thogs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am
256a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag dang lhan cig tu mi gnas/ nyan thos kyi
256a6(mdo sde): theg pa padag la mi bsnyen mi sten cing bsnyen bkur mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par mi byed/ kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed
256a7(mdo sde): kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam 'chag sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par mi byed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha ton
256b1(mdo sde): mi byed/ dpyod cing khong du chud par mi byed la/ gzhan dag kyang thar tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang klog tu 'jug par mi byed/ kha tor byed du 'jug par mi
256b2(mdo sde): byed de/ gang klog pa de'ang theg pa chen po kho na klog la/ gang ston pa de'ang theg pa khor ston cing / theg pa chen po la khon mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
256b3(mdo sde): rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/ zhes dang bcas pa byed cing / der
256b4(mdo sde): gnol der 'bab/ der bab na de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de dag la bstan cing sten la bsnyen bkur byed/ de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed/
256b5(mdo sde): kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed/ de dag dang / kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par byed pa la
256b6(mdo sde): de theg pa chen po yongs su tshol zhing sdud la 'chang bar byed/ mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me tog dang / spros dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug
256b7(mdo sde): pa dag gis mchog tu gus par mchod par byed/ de theg pa chen po klog cing kha ton byed la/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas lung 'bog par byed/
257a1(mdo sde): bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas pa'i sems mi skye/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang gsong por sprul tshig mi brlang mig tu mi
257a2(mdo sde): rtsub pa dang / dga' ba dang / snyan par smra zhing de srog gi phyir yang theg pa cher po mi spyod la de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang
257a3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la ci nus ci lcogs kyis snying nas lhag pa'i bsam pas yongs su 'dzin par byed cing de su dang
257a4(mdo sde): yang lhan cig 'gyed pa dang rtsod par mi byed la/ de sngon ma byung ba dang ma thob pa'i mdo sde rnams tshol ba'i rang bzhin can yin zhing gang dag las thos pa de dag la ston
257a5(mdo sde): pal gus pa drag po lta bu skyed par byed/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lam bslabs pa dag la khyad du gsod par mi byed la nyes
257a6(mdo sde): pa bden pa dang mi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng bar mi byed la/ nyes pa gzhan gyi 'khrul pa'ang mi tshul ning byams pa dang / spring rje dang dga' ba dang
257a7(mdo sde): btang snyoms la slob pa 'di ni 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub
257b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' de bzhiran gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu pa yin par rig par bya zhe na/ 'jam dpal dper na mil la zhig 'jig rten gyi khams de dag nyid 'da' bar 'dod
257b2(mdo sde): der yang de'i bya ba dang / bya ba chen po dang / don dang / don chen po dang // ched che ba dang / ched cher ba cig yod nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/
257b3(mdo sde): bdag gis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag myur du 'da' bar bya snyam mo// de'ang 'di snyam du dpyod de/ ma la bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag
257b4(mdo sde): 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba gdab par gor ma chag snyam nas/ 'jam dpal mi de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas gsol ba btab ste/
257b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing lnga brgya'i rdul phra ba rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar 'tshal te/ der yang gdag gis bgyi ba dang / bgyi ba
257b6(mdo sde): chen po dang don dang don chen po dang / ched che ba dang / ched cher ba cig mchis na bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar
257b7(mdo sde): mdzad du gsol zhes byas la/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas kyang mi de 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' bar mdzad na/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems
258a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag myung du 'dra bar mdzad sno ngab 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das spyod
258a2(mdo sde): lags so// bde bar gshegs pa spyod lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang
258a3(mdo sde): la la zhig bla ru med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dag la mi bsnyen
258a4(mdo sde): mi ster cing bsnyen bkur mi byed la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par mi byed kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par mi byed kun dga' ra ba 'am
258a5(mdo sde): gtsug lag khang ngam 'chag sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par mi byed la nyan thos kyi theg pa klog par mi byed/ kha ton mi byed dpyod cing khong du rud
258a6(mdo sde): par mi byed la gzhan dag kyang than tshigs su bcad pa gcig kyang / ga tu 'jug par mi byed 'aton mi byed/ 'jug par mi byed/ de'ang klog pa de'ang
258a7(mdo sde): theg pa chen po kho na klog/ gang kha tor byed pa de'ang theg pa chen po khor kha ton byed/ gang ston pa kho na de'ang theg pa chen po ston cing / de lus dang / ngag dang / yid
258b1(mdo sde): yongs su dag la / tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos can yin la/ gzhan dag kyang lus dang / ngag dang / yid yongs su dag pa la 'god/ tshul/
258b2(mdo sde): khrims dang dge ba'i chos can la 'god/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongs su
258b3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas par byed la/ der gzhol/ der 'bab/ der bab cing de dag dang lhan cig tu gnas te/ de dag la bsnyen cing
258b4(mdo sde): sten la/ bsnyen bkur byed cing de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dris par byed kun tu spyod cing longs spyod par byed la de dag dang kun dga' ra ba 'am/ gtsug lag
258b5(mdo sde): khang ngam/ 'chag sar spyod yul mthun par gnas par byed de theg pa chen po yongs su tshol zhing 'dug la 'chang bar byed/ mar me dang / bdug pa dang / me to
258b6(mdo sde): dang spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dag gis mchog tu gus pa drag pos mchod par byed de/ theg pa chen po klog cing kha ton byed la/ gzhar dag kyang dga'
258b7(mdo sde): ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen po drag pos klog tu 'jug cing / kha tor byed du 'jug/ ma bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas pa'i sems mi bskyed la
259a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de khon la 'god par byed/ de bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por skul/ gzhan dag kyang bzhin 'dzum ning
259a2(mdo sde): gsong por smra ba la 'gyod/ de tshig mi brlang / mi gtum/ mi rtsub la/ gzhan dag kyang bslab pa de kho na la 'god cing de dga' ba dang snyan par sprul/ srog gi
259a3(mdo sde): phyir yang theg pa chen po mi spong zhing de theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang theg pa chen po klog pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po yongs
259a4(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa rnams la gus pa drag po dang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba chen pos sri nu bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas gzhan dag kyang bsam pa chen po dang /
259a5(mdo sde): lhag pa'i bsam pas bslab de khon la 'gong par byed/ su dang yang lha cig 'byed pa dang rtsod par mi byed/ de sngon ma 'byung ba dang mthos pa'i ma
259a6(mdo sde): sde rnams gus pa drag pos don du gnyer zhing tshol ba dang / gang dag las thos pa de dag la ston pa la gus pa drag po lta bu skyed par byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bslab
259a7(mdo sde): de kho na la 'god/ gzhan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab pa rnams la'ang rlob sems mi byed/ nyes pa bden pa dang mi bden pas gzhan dag la gleng
259b1(mdo sde): bar mi byed nyes pa gzhan dag gis 'khrul pa'ang mi 'tshal gzhan dag kyang bslab pa kho na la 'god par byed de byang chub sems dpa'i las rung thos
259b2(mdo sde): pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i las chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/
259b3(mdo sde): de byang chub sems dpa'i lam chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i lam chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams
259b4(mdo sde): la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang
259b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chung zos pa'i sems cad gyi khams la rnam par lto ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chud zos pa'i sems cad gyi khams la
259b6(mdo sde): rnam par lta bar byed la gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems
259b7(mdo sde): dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa chud zos pa'i sems can
260a1(mdo sde): gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byedade byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la
260a2(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i
260a3(mdo sde): spyod pa'i stobs chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i spyod pa'i stobs chung
260a4(mdo sde): zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar
260a5(mdo sde): byed la gzhan dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gnas chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed la/ de byams pa dang /
260a6(mdo sde): snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byams pa dang
260a7(mdo sde): snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms chud mos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'gor par byed/ de bgo ba sha'i rang bzhin can yin la/
260b1(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang bgo ba sha'i rang bzhin can la 'god par byed/ de sangs rgyas kyi chos chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag
260b2(mdo sde): kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta
260b3(mdo sde): bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa dang bral ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can
260b4(mdo sde): gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang bcing bas bcings pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed de yun ring po nas na
260b5(mdo sde): ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang yun ring po nas ra ba'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed de spangs
260b6(mdo sde): rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa chud zos pa'i sems
260b7(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de mgon med pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang mgon med pa'i sems
261a1(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'grod par byed/ de yun ring po nas gnyis kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la
261a2(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang yur ring po nas gnyis kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de rigs ngan du gyes pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par
261a3(mdo sde): bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang rigs ngan du skyes pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems
261a4(mdo sde): can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang byang chub kyi sems chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed de byang
261a5(mdo sde): rgyu ba sems dpa'i spyod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la gzhar dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chung zos pa'i sems can
261a6(mdo sde): gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byedade chos kyi spyod pa chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la gzhan dag kyang chos kyi spyod
261a7(mdo sde): pa chung bos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed de bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar
261b1(mdo sde): byed la gzhan dag kyang bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par smra ba la 'god par byed/ de theg pa chen po la mos
261b2(mdo sde): bachung thos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la gzhan dag kyang theg pa chen po la mos pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god
261b3(mdo sde): par byed de tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa chud zos pa'i
261b4(mdo sde): sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byedade chos kyi rjes su mthur pa'i chos chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la/ gzhan
261b5(mdo sde): dag kyang chos kyi rjes su mthur pa'i chos chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bzod pa dang nges pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams
261b6(mdo sde): la rnam par lta bar byed la gzhan dag kyang bzod pa dang nges pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de zhi gnas dang
261b7(mdo sde): lhag mthong chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la gzhan dag kyang ni gnas dang lhag mthong chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par
262a1(mdo sde): lta ba la 'god par byed/ de sbyin pa dang dul ba dang / legs par sdom pa dang nges pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi
262a2(mdo sde): khams la rnam par lta bar byedagazhan dag kyang sbyin pa dang dul ba dang legs par sdom pa dang nges pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams
262a3(mdo sde): la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed de dran pa dang blo gros dang brtan pa dang rtogs pa chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed
262a4(mdo sde): la gzhan dag kyang dran pa dang blo gros dang brtun pa dang rtogs pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed
262a5(mdo sde): de pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi tshul la 'jug
262a6(mdo sde): pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byedade sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed
262a7(mdo sde): la gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi rigs su skye ba chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed de dge ba'i bshes gnyen chud zos
262b1(mdo sde): pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la gzhan dag kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed
262b2(mdo sde): de sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la gzhan dag kyang sems can la phan par 'dod pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi
262b3(mdo sde): khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed de chos la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la gzhan dag kyang chos la rton pa chud zos
262b4(mdo sde): pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de ye shes la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed gzhan dag kyang ye shes la
262b5(mdo sde): rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'gor par byed/ de don la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la gzhan
262b6(mdo sde): ngag kyang don la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnab
262b7(mdo sde): bar lta bar byed la/ gzhan dag kyang nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa chud zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed de yang dag par
263a1(mdo sde): spong ba bzhi chung zos pa'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed la gzhan dag kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi chung zos pa'i sems can gyi
263a2(mdo sde): khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed/ de bden pa'i chos dang don dang / 'dul ba slab la mkhas pa srin la gzhan dag kyang bden pa'i chos dang /
263a3(mdo sde): don dang / 'dul ba smra ba la mkhas pa la 'god par byed/ de dbul po'i sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta bar byed cing gzhan dag kyang dbul po'i sems can gyi
263a4(mdo sde): khams la rnam par lta ba la 'god par byed nge 'jig rten thams cad byams pas khyab par byed de kye ma sems cad 'di dag ni mgon med pa sems can 'di dag ni
263a5(mdo sde): skyabs med pa sems can 'di dag ni dpung gnyen med pa sems can 'di dag ri gling ming pa sems can 'di dag ni gnas med pa sems can 'di dag ni skyob
263a6(mdo sde): pa med pa yin na/ kye ma nam zhig na bdag sems can 'di dag gi mgon du gyur cig gu skyabs su gyur cig gu dpung gnyen du gyur cig gu gling du gyur cig gu
263a7(mdo sde): gnas su gyur cig gu skyob par gyur cig gu snyam mo// 'jam dpal dper na bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding lang tshe dang stobs dang / mthu chen po thob pa de
263b1(mdo sde): ni 'dod na/ ri rab kyi rtse mo nas ri rab kyi rtse mor 'gro'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i yang dge ba'i rtsa
263b2(mdo sde): ba'i stobs dang mgyogs pa dang / shugs dang rtul ba chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang du skye bar 'dod pa ngar yang skye bar 'gyur la/ ngan
263b3(mdo sde): song ngan 'gro log par lhung bar skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang sbubs dang / dpung gnyen dang / gling dang gnas dang / skyob par yang 'gyur
263b4(mdo sde): ba de ni 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu yin par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
263b5(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang
263b6(mdo sde): ldan pa phul zhing lha'i na bza' dag kyang phul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re'ang nyin gcig bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed nor bu rin po che dbang gyi
263b7(mdo sde): rgyal pos yongs su gang bar byas nas sbyin pa byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du phul la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan
264a1(mdo sde): zhig gis ni sems can gcig rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bzhag na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par bskyed do// 'jam
264a2(mdo sde): dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul skyed kyi sems can thams cad rgyun du zhugs
264a3(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bu la bkrod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ni sems can gcig lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag na 'di ni de bas ches
264a4(mdo sde): bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab
264a5(mdo sde): kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig phyir mi 'ong
264a6(mdo sde): pa'i 'bras bul ba nag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med paskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs
264a7(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi ya ba mang gyi chu med kyi sems cad thams cad phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bul bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gzhan
264b1(mdo sde): zhig gis ni sems can gcig dgu bcom pa nyid la banag na/ 'di ni bas ches bsod rapas grangs med paskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi glu'am rigs kyi chu
264b2(mdo sde): mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
264b3(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gzhan dag gis ni sems can gcig rang sangs rgyas nyid la bzhag da 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am
264b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems cad thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod la rigs
264b5(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis sems can gcig ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed
264b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thabs
264b7(mdo sde): cad ri'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems cad gcig glang po che'i shing rtas
265a1(mdo sde): 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med paskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am
265a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad glang po che'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi
265a3(mdo sde): sems la bkodu la/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems cad gcig zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na 'di
265a4(mdo sde): ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
265a5(mdo sde): kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can thams cad zla ba dang nyi mas 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis
265a6(mdo sde): ni sems can gcig nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag na/ 'di ni de bas rjes bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam
265a7(mdo sde): dpal rigs kyi gralam rigs kyi bum gang la la nig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul tha rab kyi rdul nyid kyi sems can thams cad mtho
265b1(mdo sde): kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig de bzhin gshegs pa
265b2(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bzhag ra 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
265b3(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing
265b4(mdo sde): lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ lha de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni dge bsnyen dad pa
265b5(mdo sde): can gsum la skyabs su song ba bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na 'di ni de
265b6(mdo sde): bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
265b7(mdo sde): rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi dge bsnyen dad pa can gsum la skyabs su song ba/ bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dga' ba
266a1(mdo sde): rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lba'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyir ba bskal pa gad+hA'i klung gi bye ba skyed
266a2(mdo sde): du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni gang zag brgyad pa la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na 'don de bas ches bsod nams grangs med
266a3(mdo sde): pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi gang zag
266a4(mdo sde): brgyud pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du rgyu'i bas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing rtswa'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal ba gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la
266a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//

266a7(mdo sde): gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin ning lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi phyi ma snyed du byin lo/ rigs kyi
266b1(mdo sde): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba gcig la nyin gcig ngan gcig byin na/ 'di ni debs ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam

266b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis
266b7(mdo sde): ni dgra bcom pa gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
267a1(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro
267a2(mdo sde): brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i zas gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig

267a4(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i thus ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing
267a5(mdo sde): lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu'i
267a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gcig la nyin gcig zan gcig byin na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal
267a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe gang dang gang la brtsams te byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa de'i tshedes sems de la mi dge ba'i las ma spangs pa ci'ang ming la/ nges sangs
267b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos gang yang ma bzung ba med pa'i phyir te/ 'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal
267b2(mdo sde): dper na bya'i rgyal po ka la bing+ka'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug cing / mig ma bye ba dag gis kyang sgra skad kyi gdangs zab cing snyan pas bya'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon par
267b3(mdo sde): byed do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du dang po'i sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug cing / mig las dang / nyon mongs pa'i mun pa'i
267b4(mdo sde): rab rib kyis spris yog pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo ba'i sbyor ba bsgrub pa'i snga skad kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnor par byed do// 'jam
267b5(mdo sde): dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi ra'i shing rtas 'gro ba lta bu pa'i byang chub
267b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos dag byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byed la/ rigs

268a6(mdo sde): nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing lha'i gos dag kyang byin te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la rigs

268b7(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ri chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos shing yid ches par byed na/ 'di ni de bas tshes bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do//
269a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi zas
269a2(mdo sde): byed du bcug la stong gsum gyi stong chen po bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul skyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas la/ nor bu rin po che
269a3(mdo sde): glog gi sgren mas spras pa/ nor bu rin po che sdang ba thams cad brtsegs pa'i stegs bus bskor ba/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / rin po che'i chun pos mdzes par byas pa
269a4(mdo sde): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas bkab pa/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla re bris pa/ tsar dan sbrul gyi snying /
269a5(mdo sde): bos byugs pa/ me tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / snga ma'i me tog dang / klu shing gi me tog dang /
269a6(mdo sde): bar na dang / gau tar ni dang / dri mchog dang / d+ha ru ka ri dang lnga'i snga ma'i me tog dang / ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / kumra dang / bad+ma dkar po dang /
269a7(mdo sde): chog chen po rnabs bkram par byed du bcug ste/ rang sangs rgyas de dag la lha'i zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin zhing / lha'i gos ngas kyang byon te/ de ltar skyed pa bzhal pag ng+gA'i
269b1(mdo sde): krung gi bye ba snyed du byir la/ rigs kyi du'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'ang/ 'jig rter gyi
269b2(mdo sde): mgon po zhes bya ba'i ska bos sa pa/ ri mar bris pa mthong ngam/ gzugs su byas pa mthong na/ 'di ni debs ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed par gyur ra/ gang
269b3(mdo sde): sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar ba lta smos te/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// gang mar me 'am/ bdug pa 'am/ me tog gam/ spos 'bul ba lta ci
269b4(mdo sde): smos te/ tha na de'i yon tan bsngags pa gcig tsam brjod na'ang / 'di ni dri bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do// longs spyod chen po 'grub par byed cing / mthar
269b5(mdo sde): gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal dper na mu thigs pa chung ngu rgya mtsho chen por song ba'ang sreg pa'i bskul pa'i mem byung gi bar du bar mdor yongs su
269b6(mdo sde): zad par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ji ltar chung ba'ang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ma ma byung gi bar du bar mdor yongs
269b7(mdo sde): su zad pa'am/ mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ji ltar chung yang 'di lta ste/ bong dang / khyon dang / che bas
270a1(mdo sde): skur pa'i tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan nas ljang nger 'dug cing kun tu lhung nger 'jug go// 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la dge
270a2(mdo sde): ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ji ltar chung yang / 'di lta ste/ mtho ba dang / yangs pa dang / che ba dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lhung nger 'dug go// 'jam dpal
270a3(mdo sde): de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
270a4(mdo sde): gang la la zhig phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams
270a5(mdo sde): dang bcas pa la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i nal zlas ro ban+d+ha dang ldan pa phul zhing lha'i na bza' dag kyang phul te/ de ltar sbyin pa bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin la
270a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi grwa'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzham nig gis ni chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos par byed na 'di ni debs ches bsod rnams grangs med pa bskyed par gyuran
270a7(mdo sde): gang gis mi gar 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug pa'am/ ston par byed pa la ci smos te// 'di ni dedabs sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'i bsod rnams
270b1(mdo sde): ches pang du bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gangal la zhig gis snang ba'i sems kyi 'an thos dang rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med bdag gi
270b2(mdo sde): drang gos bcas la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni khros te sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i zar gcig phyogs
270b3(mdo sde): ci 'phrog gam zan gcig gcod du bcug na 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa/
270b4(mdo sde): dang da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab
270b5(mdo sde): la sogs pa bskal pa bye ba grangs med pa nas yang dag par bsgrubs par gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni/ rang gi sems kyi rgyu las skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms
270b6(mdo sde): par byed par zad kyi byang chub sems dpa' tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can la kham gcig tsam yongs su btang ba'ang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chang
270b7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal nan gyis dper byas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis khros te sdang ba'i sems kyis
271a1(mdo sde): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dpag tu me grangs med padag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi
271a2(mdo sde): phung po dang / rnam par 'grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po med par byas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig
271a3(mdo sde): gis ni sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims tha na bslab pa gcig blangs pa tsam yang med par byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa
271a4(mdo sde): grangs med pa bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin phung po dang / shes
271a5(mdo sde): rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung ba ni rang gi sems kyi rgyud las skyes pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams
271a6(mdo sde): 'joms par byed par zad kyi/ byang chub sems dpa'i than nyi ma gcig gi bslab pa gcig las byung ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes
271a7(mdo sde): rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po thams cad ni/ sems cad thams cad kyi chen mongs pa thams
271b1(mdo sde): cad 'joms par byed pa nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar du 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang lal zhig gis
271b2(mdo sde): khros te gdong sems kyi sems kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad brtson rar bcug la/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni byang chub sems
271b3(mdo sde): dpa' la khros te/ gnod sems kyi sems kyis 'di dang phrad par ma gyur cig ces rgyab kyi phyogs de 'dug na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa'i grangs med pa bskyed do//
271b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rter gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mig phyung la/ rigs kyi bu'am
271b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni khros te gnod sems kyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bltas na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam
271b6(mdo sde): dpal nar gyis dper byan/ gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mig phyung bar gyur la/ de na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
271b7(mdo sde): bu mo gang la la nig gos byams pa'i sems kyis mig bskyed la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
272a1(mdo sde): la dga' ba'i sems kyis bltas na/ 'di ni debs ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu ra/
272a2(mdo sde): gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can btso ran 'dug pa las/ brtson ranas thar par byas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bde ba
272a3(mdo sde): la bkod cing 'khor los sgyur ba'i bde ba la'ang bkod la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
272a4(mdo sde): la dga' ba'i sems kyis mthong bar 'dod cing / dga' ba'i sems kyis de'i bsngags pa brjod na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam
272a5(mdo sde): dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rte gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad rang sangs rgyas nyid la bkod la/ byang chub sems dpa'
272a6(mdo sde): gzhar zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba sangs rgyas la bskyed pa gcig tsum 'phel bar byas da 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams
272a7(mdo sde): grangs med pa bskyod do// 'jam dpal theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jog rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams
272b1(mdo sde): cad byang chub sems kyi sems la bkod la theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
272b2(mdo sde): phung po med pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam 'don du bcug na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal nan gyis dpar byas na/ rigs
272b3(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul skyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams sems can dmyal ba
272b4(mdo sde): dang dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams su skyes par byas la/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' gcig byang chub kyi sems
272b5(mdo sde): las mos pa bzlog na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i
272b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la/ byang chub kyi sems las mos pa bzlog pa/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi
272b7(mdo sde): bu mo gzhan zhig gis ni tha na theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig theg pa chen po la mos pa bzlog na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa bskyed do//
273a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas
273a2(mdo sde): dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur la/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis sems can de dag thams cad sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang
273a3(mdo sde): yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas bton nas byang chub kyi sems la bkod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis ni sems can gcig theg pa chen po la mos
273a4(mdo sde): pa la 'jug par byed na/ 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdul
273a5(mdo sde): phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas rnams rang sangs rgyas las nyams par byed la/ gcig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig byang chub sems dpa'
273a6(mdo sde): las nyams par byas na/ 'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyis rang
273a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti gcad pa'i phyir rnyed pa dang bkur sti la ser sna'i sems bskyed cing / phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su de dag gi grags pa
273b1(mdo sde): dang sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa bsngags la rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gzham zhig gis ni theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang
273b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gcig gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti gcad pa'i phyir rnyed pa dang bkur sti la ser sna'i sems bskyed cing bsngags pa ma yin pa bsgrags na 'di
273b3(mdo sde): ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med pa bskyed do// 'jam dpal gang la la zhig gis dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems
273b4(mdo sde): dpa' la dga' ba'i sems kyis tha na tshu ra'i chu tsam byin na'ang las nges de 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid du ma myong bar 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' klog pa dang la
273b5(mdo sde): ton byed pa la mos pa lta ci smos// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang nyan thos de dag dang
273b6(mdo sde): lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa
273b7(mdo sde): nges pa dang mnges par 'gro ba'i phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang / su ren dra bo rje dang /
274a1(mdo sde): zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+da d+he ye shes sde bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa// / rgyu gar skad du
274a2(mdo sde): Ar+ya b+ha ga ba te b+hai Shadz+ya gu ru bai DUR+Ya pra b+ha s+ya pUr+tha pra Ni d+hA ra bi ste ra na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon
274a3(mdo sde): lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na
274a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing yangs pa can du byon te/ yangs pa can rol mo'i sgra can gyi shing ljon pa'i drung na dge slong brgyad stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs
274a5(mdo sde): cig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sum khri drug stong dang yang thabs cig tu rgyal po dang / blon po dang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams dang /
274a6(mdo sde): lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing bdun gyis bltas te chos ston to//
274a7(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi rgyal bu 'jam dpal stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom
274b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang thos pas sems can rnams las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byung bar/
274b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang / slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus dam pa'i chos ltar bcos pa 'byung ba na sems can de dag rjes su gzung ba'i slad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan
274b3(mdo sde): dang sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas par bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so
274b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byin te/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod ni snying rje dang ldan pa ste/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi snying rje dpag tu med pa bskyed nas/ sems
274b5(mdo sde): can las kyi sgrib pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa rnams dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi ngor dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gsol ba 'debs pa ri yang legs so// 'jab
274b6(mdo sde): dpal de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyor la yid la zung zhig dang bshad do// 'jab dpal gzhor nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das
274b7(mdo sde): kyi ltar nyan pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyi de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bcu'i
275a1(mdo sde): bye ba snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bai DU rlar snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
275a2(mdo sde): rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom
275a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od ces bya ba bzhugs so// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spar gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/
275a4(mdo sde): smon lam chen po bcu gnyis po 'di dag btab bo// bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ de'i smon lam chen po dang po ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
275a5(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag gi lus kyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med cing / dpag gis mi lang ba dag lam me lhan ne lhang nger
275a6(mdo sde): gyur cig/ sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus legs par brgyan par gyur te/ bdag ci 'dra ba bzhin du sems can thams
275a7(mdo sde): cad kyang de dang 'dra bar gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
275b1(mdo sde): bar sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub thob pa na/ lus nor bu rin po che bai DUR+Ya ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar phyi nang shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / dri ma med la 'od gsal ba dang
275b2(mdo sde): kho lag yangs shing rgya che ba dang / dpal dang / gzi brjid 'bar ba dang / legs par gnas pa dang / nyi ma dang zla ba bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba rnams kyis legs
275b3(mdo sde): par brgyan par gyur cig/ der sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi bar dag tu skyes pa dag dang / gang dag yang mi'i 'jig rten 'dir/ mtshan po mun pa mur gnag gi rang
275b4(mdo sde): na phyogs tha dad par 'gro ba de dag bdag gi 'od kyis phyogs dga' dgur 'gro bar gyur cig/ las rnams kyang byed par gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po gsum
275b5(mdo sde): pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na bdag
275b6(mdo sde): shes rab dang thabs dpag tu med pas sems can gyi khams dpag gis mi lang ba dag longs spyod pa mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur te/ su'ang cis kyang brel ba med par gyur cig ces
275b7(mdo sde): btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus ra bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i
276a1(mdo sde): bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can gang dag lam ngan par zhugs pa de dag byang chub kyi lam la dgod par bya'o// nyan thos kyi lam du zhugs pa dang
276a2(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs pa de dag thams cad ni theg pa chen po la gzung bar bya'o zhes btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po lnga pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus/
276a3(mdo sde): na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i bdag byang chub thob pa ra sems can gang dag bdag gi gan tshangs par spyad pa
276a4(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / de bzhin du sems can gzhan dpag tu med cing dpag gis mi lang ba de dag thams cad kyang bdag gi ming thos nas bdag gi mthus sdom pa gsum gyis bsdams
276a5(mdo sde): po dang / tshul khrims nyams pa med par gyur cig/ su'ang tshul khrims log par zhugs te/ ngan par 'gro bar mgyur cig ces btab bo// de'i tshun
276a6(mdo sde): lam chen po drug pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag byang chub

276b6(mdo sde): lam cher chen po brgyad pa ri gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na blar med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob
276b7(mdo sde): pa na bud med gang la la bud med kyi skyo brgya dag gis gud nas nyon mongs par gyur pa/ bud med kyi dngos po la slong ba/ bud med kyi skye gnas las yongs su thar par 'dod pa de dag bud

277a2(mdo sde): pa ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na sems can thams cad

277a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan par bya'o zhes btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bcu pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
277a5(mdo sde): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob pa na/ sems can gang su dag rgyal po'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang / gang dag bcing ba dang
277a6(mdo sde): brdeg pa dang / go rar gzhug pa dang / gsad par 'os pa du mas kun tu gtses pa nga rgyal dang bral ba/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems sdug bsngal gyis
277a7(mdo sde): nyen pa de dag bdag gi bsod nams kyi mthus gnod pa thams cad las yongs su thar par gyur cig ces btab bo// de'i smon lam chen po bcu gcig pa ni/ gang gi tshe bdag ma
277b1(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ bdag byang chub thob par sems cad gang su drug bkres pa dang nom pa'i/
277b2(mdo sde): me rab tu 'bar ba/ kha zas tshol ba la rab tu brtson pa sdig pa'i las byed pa de dag bdag gi kha dog dang / dri dang / ror ldan pa'i kha zas kyis lus tshim par byas
277b3(mdo sde): phyi chos kyi ros shin tu bde ba la dgod par bya'o zhes btab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i smon lam chen po bcu gnyis po ni gang gi tshe bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus
277b4(mdo sde): na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe/ sems can gang su drug sgren mo// bgo ba med pa/ dbul ba/ sdug
277b5(mdo sde): bsngal ba/ grang ba dang / tsha ba dang / sdang bu dang / she sdang dag gis nyin mtshan du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag la bdag gis gos yongs su spyad pa tshon
277b6(mdo sde): sna tshogs su kha bsgyur ba dag sbyin par bya'o// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang / sdud pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang
277b7(mdo sde): byug pa dang / rol mo'i sgo dang sil snyan dang pheg rdob pa rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces btang
278a1(mdo sde): go 'jub dpal bco ba lngar 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgyur gyi tha ba nana'i 'od de sngon byang chub
278a2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam chen po bcu gnyis po de dag btab par gyur to// 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs sman gyi bai DUR+Ya'i 'od smon lam gang yin pa
278a3(mdo sde): dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa de ni bskal pa'am/ bskal ba las lhag par yang zad par byer mi nus so// sangs rgyas
278a4(mdo sde): kyi zhing de'i ni shin tu yongs su dag pa ste/ rdo dang / gseg pa dang / gyo mo med pa/ 'dod pa'i skyon med pa/ ngan song dang sdug bsngal gyi sgra med pa
278a5(mdo sde): bung med kyi dngos po med pa/ sa dang / rtsig pa dang / rab dang / rta babs dang mar khung ga dra ba dang / bag pa ri bain+yArI'i rang bzhin can pa bu shu ni rin
278a6(mdo sde): po che sna bdud gyi rang bzhin can te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba can ci 'dra ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+Yar snang ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'ang de dang
278a7(mdo sde): 'dra'o// 'jig rten gyi khams der byang chub sems dpa' grangs med dpag tu med pa de dag gi na pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gca gnyis yod do//
278b1(mdo sde): gcig gi ming ni nyi ma ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya/ gnyis pa'i ming ni zla ba ltar rnam par snang byed ces bya/ de dag ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi
278b2(mdo sde): b+hu bai DU R+Ya'i 'od de'i dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pa'o// 'jam dpal de lta bas na ngang pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon la mthob
278b3(mdo sde): cig yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhor nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal sems can so so'i skye bo gang dag dge ba dang
278b4(mdo sde): mi dge ba mi shes pa dag yod de/ de dag ni chags pa'i zil gyis non pa sbyin pa dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi shes pa'o// de dag ni byis pa glen pa dang pa
278b5(mdo sde): dbang po dang bral ba/ nor sogs shing bsrung ba la mngon par brtson gyi sbyin pa yang dag par bged pa de dag gi sems mi 'gro ba ste/ sbyin pa'i dus nye bar gnas pa na//
278b6(mdo sde): rang gi lus kyi sha las bcad pa bzhin du yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// sems can de dag ni bdag nyid kyang du ma yongs su mi spyod na/ pha ma dang / chung ma dang / bu dang /
278b7(mdo sde): bu mo la mi ster blta smos kyang ci dgos/ brangar po dang / bran po dang / las byed pa rnams dang / gzhar spong ba rnams la lta spos kyang ci dgos/ sems can de lta bu de dag ni
279a1(mdo sde): 'di nas shi 'phos na yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro// yang na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// de la gang sngon mir gyur pa na
279a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spar g+hi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas kyang rung dud 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas kyang
279a3(mdo sde): rung ste/ der de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan mngon du 'gyur zhing drar ma thag pa tsam gyis de nas shi 'phos nas yang mi'i 'jig rter du skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe rabs
279a4(mdo sde): dran par 'gyur ro// ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pas skrag nas yang 'dod pa'i yon tan dag don du mi gnyer ba dang / sbyir ba la mngon par dga' ba dang / sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod
279a5(mdo sde): pa dang / badrog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ rim gyis rang gi mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / sha dang / khrag kyang slong ba
279a6(mdo sde): rnams la rab tu sbyin par 'gyur na/ nor gyi phung po gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos 'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bslab pa'i
279a7(mdo sde): gnas 'jig pa dag yod de/ de dag tshul khrims log par zhugs shing lta ba log par zhugs nas gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa de dag ni tshul khrims bsrung gi
279b1(mdo sde): mang du thob pa yongs su mi tshol te/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams kyi dor zab po mi shes gang dag rlung du thos pa de dag ni lhag pa'ang rgyal can du gyur te/
279b2(mdo sde): nga rgyal gyis non pas gzhan dag la phrag dog byed cing dam pa'i chos la dbang za bar 'gyur/ spong bar 'gyur ro// mi blun po de lta bu de dag ni bdud kyi phyogs pa
279b3(mdo sde): bdag kyang lam ngan par zhugs la/ sems can gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag kyang g.yang sa chen por lhung bar byed pa'o// sems can de lta bu de dag ri sems cad
279b4(mdo sde): dmyal ba mi bzad par 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang dag sngon mir gyur pa ra bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni
279b5(mdo sde): sems can dmyal ba na gnas kyang der sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan mngon du gyur te/ de dag de nas shi 'phos ras yang mi'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur//
279b6(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i lta ba can dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang dge ba'i bsam pa can du 'gyur ro// de dag khyim spangs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan
279b7(mdo sde): pa la rab tu byung ba nas mthar gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyar pa spyod par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gang dag bdag gi bsngags pa brjod
280a1(mdo sde): cing phrag dog gis gzhan dag la mi snyan pa brjod pa yod de bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod pa'i sems can de dag ngan song gsum po
280a2(mdo sde): dag tu lo stong phrag mang por sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro// de dag lo stong phrag du ma 'das nas de nas shi 'phos nas baglang dang / rta dang / rnga mo dang
280a3(mdo sde): bong bu la sogs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// lcug lcag dang dbyig rnams kyis brdeg pa dang bkres pa dang / skom pas lus nyen pa dang
280a4(mdo sde): khal chen po bkol te lam du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gal te brgya la mi'i skye ba rnyed na'ang rtag tu rigs dma' ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur/ bran du 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi dbang du
280a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// gang dag sngon mir gyur pa na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'ong de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des sdug bsngal thams
280a6(mdo sde): cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ dbang po rno bar 'gyur/ mkhas pa dang / gsal ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang / dge ba yongs su btsal ba la
280a7(mdo sde): mngon par brtson pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa rnyed par 'gyur/ bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa dang / ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs gcog pa dang
280b1(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i chu klung skems par 'gyur/ skye ba dang rga shi dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'dor pa pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang / 'jug/
280b2(mdo sde): parnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhan yang sems can gzhan yang sems cad gang dag phra ma la mngon par dga' zhing sems
280b3(mdo sde): can dag phan tshun 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang 'gyed par byed du 'jug pa dag yod de/ sems can de dag rnam par rtsod pa'i sems su gyur pas lus dang
280b4(mdo sde): ngag dang yid kyis mi dge ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed do// gcig la gcig phan pa ma yin pa 'dod cing rtag tu phar tshun gnod par bya ba'i phyir
280b5(mdo sde): brtsor te/ de dag nags tshal gyi lha dang / shing gi lha dang / ri'i lha 'gugs par byed dur khrod rnams su 'byung po tha dad pa dag 'gugs par byed dud
280b6(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyi srog gcod cing shra dang khrag za ba'i gdod sbyir dang / srin po rnams mchod par byed de/ dgra bo'i ming ras brjod
280b7(mdo sde): pa 'am/ gzugs byas ras der rig sngags drag po sgrub cing byad stebs dang ro langs kyi sbyor bas srog gi bar chad bya ba dang / lus rnam par zhig par 'dod
281a1(mdo sde): pa la gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag la gang gis kyang bar chad bya bar mi
281a2(mdo sde): nus te/ de dag phan tshun byams pa'i sems dang gnod sems med pa'i sems su gnas par gyur/ rang rang gi bdog pas chog shes par 'gyur ro// 'jam
281a3(mdo sde): dpal gzhan yang 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyed dang / dge bsnyen ma de dag dang / gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
281a4(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang dag yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas te/ lo gcig gam/ zla ba gsum du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams 'dzin cing gang dag gi bsam pas
281a5(mdo sde): bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar shog cig ces smon lam de lta bu btab pa dag
281a6(mdo sde): las gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
281a7(mdo sde): brgyad rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags nas lam ston par 'gyur te/ de dag der pad+ma tshon kha dog sna tshogs rnams las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// gang la la dag lha'i 'jig rten du
281b1(mdo sde): rgyu bar 'gyur ba de dag dang smras nas sbyor gyi dge ba'i dra ba de zad par mi 'gyur zhing ngan 'byor 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas shi 'phos nas kyang mi'i 'jig rten 'dir bring bani ba'i/
281b2(mdo sde): dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/ sems can bye ba khrug khrig brgya skyong du ma dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par 'gyur ro// gzhan du ra'ang
281b3(mdo sde): rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur bram ze shing sAl chen po lta bu'i khyim dag dang khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag dang / nor
281b4(mdo sde): dang 'bru dang mdzod dang / bang ba mang po 'byor pa'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur te/ gzugs phur sum tshogs pa dang / dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog bur
281b5(mdo sde): sum tshogs pa dang / dpa' ba dang / rtul phod pa dang / tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bud med gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos
281b6(mdo sde): shing bzung ba des de bud med kyi dngos po de tha ma yin par shes par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhor rur gyur pas 'di skad ces
281b7(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na gang dag mdo 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / yi
282a1(mdo sde): ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / glegs bam la bris te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang /
282a2(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan rnams kyis bkur sti bgyid pa'i dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan rnam
282a3(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs su bsgrags par bgyi'o// tha na rmi lam du'ang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rnalam du nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// tshon sna lnga pa'i ras rnams kyis bkris te phyogs gtsang mar
282a4(mdo sde): bzhag na gang na mdo sde 'di gnas pa der rgyal po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gzhan yang mchi bar 'gyur ro// gang dag bcom ldan
282a5(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa slar gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de'i mtshan dang / sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par rgyas pa'i mdo 'di 'dzin pa de dag dus ma lags par 'gum par mi 'gyur/ sus
282a6(mdo sde): kyang mdangs 'phrog par mi rus te/ phrogs na'ang slar stsol bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de de
282a7(mdo sde): bzhin no// 'jam dpal ngang pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa byed pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de'i gzugs bya/ nyin
282b1(mdo sde): zhag bdun 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas par bya kha zas gtsang ma bza' zhing lus legs par bkrus te gos bzang po dri ma
282b2(mdo sde): med pa bgo zhingaphyogs gtsang ma me tog sna tshogs sil ma bkram pa/ spos sna tshogs kyi bdugs pa ras dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kyis
282b3(mdo sde): legs par brgyan pa'i sa phyogs su dri ma med pa'i sems dang / rnyog pa med pa'i sems dang / gnod sems med pa'i sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang / btang
282b4(mdo sde): snyoms kyi sems dang / mnyam pa'i sems su bya/ rol mo'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs blang zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de la bskor bar bya ste/
282b5(mdo sde): de'i sngon gyi smon lam yang yid la bya zhing mdo 'di'ang bstar na/ gang bsams pa dang / gang smon pa'i bsam pa de thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ gal te tshe ring
282b6(mdo sde): bar smon na ni tshe ring por 'gyur ro// gal te longs spyod dang ldan par spor na ni longs spyod 'byor par 'gyur ro// gal te dbang phyug dang ldan par spon na ri tshigs chung ngus rnyed
282b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// gal te bu 'dod na ni bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// gang dag sdig pa can gyi rmi lam rmis sam/ gang du bya khra dang ltas ngan mthong ngam/ gang gnas gong du bkra ba shis
283a1(mdo sde): pa brgya dag gnas par gyur pa la gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi b+ha bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkur stir byed
283a2(mdo sde): rmi lamangar ba dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad bathong bar mi 'gyur ro// gang dag mes 'jigs pa dang / chus 'jigs pa dang /
283a3(mdo sde): mtshon gyis 'jigs pa dang / dug gis 'jigs pa dang / g.yangasas 'jigs pa dang / glang po re gtum pos 'jigs pa dang / seng ges 'jigs pa dang / stag gis 'jigs
283a4(mdo sde): pa dang / ngom dang / dred dang / sbrul gdug pas 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa dang / rkang lag brgyu pas 'jigs pa dang / de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa byas
283a5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// gang dag pha rol gyi dam sna tshogs kyis 'jigs pa dang / rkud pos 'jigs pa dang / chom pos 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang
283a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bya'o// 'jam dpal gzhar yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su
283a7(mdo sde): 'dzin cing lha gzhar mi 'dzin pa dang / gang dag yang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag 'dzin pa dang / gang dag bslab pa gzhi bcu po dag 'dzin pa dang / gang dag byang chub sems
283b1(mdo sde): dpa'i sdom pa bslab pa'i gzhi brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang / khyim gyi gnas nas byung ba'i dge slong gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi nyis brgya lnga bcu po dag 'dzin pa dang / dge slong ma gang
283b2(mdo sde): dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang / gang dag ji ltar yongs su bzung ba'i bslab pa'i sdom pa de dag gi nang nas/ bslab pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig las nyams
283b3(mdo sde): par gyur te/ ngan 'grong na song gi 'jigs skrag pa gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bu bai DU R+Ya'i 'od de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na de dag la
283b4(mdo sde): ngar song gsum gyi sdug bsngal med par shes par bya'o// bud med gang la la bu btsa' ba'i dus na sdug bsngal ma rungs pa drag po mi bzad pa myong ba des bcom ldan 'das
283b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya'i 'od de la mchod na/ de myur du yongs su thar par 'gyur/ bu'ang yan lag yongs su tshang bar btsa' zhing gzugs bzang ba dang / mdzes
283b6(mdo sde): pa dang / blta na sdug pa dang / dbang po rno ba dang / blo dang ldan pa dang / nad med cing gnod pa nyung bar 'gyur te/ de la mi ma yin pas mdangs 'phrog par mi nus
